frameDefinitions: An Experiencer must cope with some Condition for a prolonged period, usually against his or her will.
An Agent ceases an Activity without completing it. ''
The words in this frame involve an Undesirable_event which affects the Patient negatively.
An Entity undergoes some change (the Event) that is (or is construed as) punctual.
An Entity is affected by an Event.
This frame concerns an Addict's physiological or psychological compulsive dependence on an Addictant, the substance or behavior to which the Addict is addicted. ''
frameExamples: After the lawsuit, the company <t>stopped</t> producing the once very profitable toy.
The first <t>calamity</t> was a disastrous trade war with Holland.
This <t>happens</t> to me all the time.
The hotel is <t>undergoing</t> renovations at this time.
Although she was never a big fan of drugs, she became <t>hooked</t> on that designer drug instantly.
listRoleDefinitions: A person who experiences the effects of some situation or <fen>Condition</fen> for a long period of time.
This role describes the situation that the <fen>Experiencer</fen> must cope with over a long period of time.
A general description of the temporal location of the <fen>Experiencer</fen> while coping with the <fen>Condition</fen>.
Where the <fen>Experiencer</fen> is located when he or she faces the <fen>Condition</fen>.
This role identifies <fen>Agent</fen> that stops the <fen>Activity</fen>.
This role identifies the <fen>Activity</fen> that the <fen>Agent</fen> stops.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Agent</fen> stops the <fen>Activity</fen>.
This role identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where the <fen>Agent</fen> stops the <fen>Activity</fen>.
The undesirable event which occurs.
The entity that experiences the <fen>Undesirable_Event</fen>.
When the <fen>Undesirable_Event</fen> occurs.
Where the <fen>Undesirable_Event</fen> takes place.
This role identifies the event which occurs and affects the <fen>Entity</fen>.
This role identifies the entity, concrete or abstract.
This role identifies the time when the event occurs.
This role identifies where the event takes place.
The thing which is affected by the Event.
A change in the world which affects the <fen>Entity</fen>.
The <fen>Time</fen> at which the <fen>Entity</fen> undergoes the <fen>Event</fen>.
The location at which the <fen>Entity</fen> undergoes the <fen>Event</fen>.
The <fen>Addict</fen> is physiologically or psychologically dependent on a substance or a behavior.
<fen>Addictant</fen> is the substance or behavior to which the <fen>Addict</fen> is dependent.
listRoleExamples: An <fex>environmental</fex> disaster is just what we need.
